messages.message:
:cypress-spin: Cypress on-call summary

Failing tests
• the following tests are failing on aihub-sandbox and aihub-uat because of recent changes for the new top nav / app UX @Paul H 
    ◦ `converse-billing.spec.ts`
    ◦ `converse-project-crud.spec.ts`
    ◦ `app-billing.spec.ts`
• `Billing/payment.spec.ts` is failing on aihub-sandbox and aihub-uat because we keep getting `Error: no auth mechanism defined` errors for calls to `https://api.metronome.com/v1/customers/<customer-id>/plans` @Victor Zeng 
• `ground-truth-crud` fails ~50% of the time because of a bug in React 17 (https://github.com/facebook/react/issues/23090#issuecomment-1289352723)
    ◦ TLDR (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/68605) the component re-renders when `isFetching` goes from true to false, but a `useEffect` with `isFetching` in its dependencies does not re-render :sobbadobbasob: 
Other notes
• @Paul H fixed `advanced-apps` on Tuesday (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/68529) - thanks Paul! :raised_hands: 
• @Xindi Xu fixed `workspaces-drives` on Wednesday (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/68587) and debugged `workspaces-connectors-crud` on Friday (https://instabase.slack.com/archives/CSY11CK7T/p1741302508156599) - thanks Xindi! :raised_hands: 
    ◦ @Abhishek Adupa is working on the db issue causing `workspaces-connectors-crud` to fail
• there was a failed deployment (https://instabase.slack.com/archives/CCY413CSU/p1741365380966269?thread_ts=1741363348.853119&cid=CCY413CSU) to crafting-cyp today because the deployment pipeline erroneously tried to delete the AWS Lambdas for this environment - thank you @sean.donohoe for fixing this! :raised_hands:
It looks like the `metronome_api_key` has disappeared from the cypress env?
Were there any changes to the env recently?
